course_description: This course provides instruction in diction usage by solo singers and includes continued study of the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) as applied to French and German languages. It focuses on the special needs and considerations for diction utilized by singers.
sections: Class Nbr: 1027, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: B. Howard, Status: Open
